items.name: Canarias
items.details: Our best seller. Shipped directly from Brazil. Uruguay's most popular brand. No stems, fine grind, and a nice smooth flavor, with a surprising kick.

items.name: Bronston OG
items.details: A calabash so soft, you’d think it’s leather. Buttersmooth, dark, and velvety, you’re sipping from a premium vessel, enhancing the experience with every sip. With unique natural shapes, dark espresso colors, and perfect imperections, no Bronston Cup is the same.

items.name: Lucho
items.details: Handcrafed with 100% pure alpaca steel, and accented with a bronze handle and filter fixture, the Lucho Bombilla looks as good as it filters. A simple bombilla with an elongated tapered spout and friendly bronze handle, your mate flows freely and adjusting is a breeze.
